name: Day One Agency
tagline: Fresh Thinking. New Energy. Every Day.
description:
We work with the world’s leading brands to shape, share and fuel stories that stop people in their scrolls. By ignoring tradition, we create campaigns that impact culture while driving business results.
 
Day One Agency was created by combining the best pieces of traditional public relations, digital and social media agencies. We’re the puzzle piece that brings marketing and communications together with fresh ideas that connect, engage and influence.
